# Gaea

Spawn your personal website.

## Use

### Binary Executables

Linux x64 | Windows | OS X

### Source Installation

    pip install goddess

## Develop

### Try/Test

    git clone https://github.com/canopy/gaea.git && cd gaea
    poetry install
    poetry run python -m gaea

### Build

    poetry run python build.py ( linux | macos | windows )
    ./dist/gaea [ port ]
